About.title: About KeyBooks
About.p1: At KeyBooks, we believe that every story deserves to be told in a beautiful and timeless way. We are passionate about creating personalized and custom-made books that reflect your memories, ideas, and special moments.
About.p2: Whether it’s a heartfelt gift, a unique storybook for children, a collection of family memories, or even a professional edition, our team of designers and creators carefully crafts each book with attention to detail and love for storytelling.
About.p3: From the very first sketch to the final printed masterpiece, we ensure that your vision comes to life. Every page is thoughtfully designed, every detail refined — because we know how important it is to create not just a book, but a keepsake that lasts a lifetime.
About.p4: Our mission is simple: to turn your ideas into books that inspire, connect, and bring joy. With KeyBooks, your story becomes art.
About.tagline: KeyBooks — Where Your Story Becomes a Masterpiece.

q1.question: What is KeyBooks?
q1.answer: KeyBooks is a service where we design and create personalized books tailored just for you — from storybooks and photo albums to professional editions.

q2.question: How long does it take to create a custom book?
q2.answer: Typically, it takes 1–2 weeks depending on the complexity and size of your project. We always ensure top-quality design and printing.

q3.question: Can I gift a KeyBooks project?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Our books are perfect as thoughtful gifts for birthdays, anniversaries, weddings, and special moments.

q4.question: Do you ship internationally?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer worldwide shipping so your story can reach loved ones anywhere in the world.

q5.question: How do I get started with my custom book?
q5.answer: Simply contact us through our website to discuss your ideas and vision. We’ll guide you through the process from start to finish.

q6.question: What if I need help with my book project?
q6.answer: Our team is here to help! You can reach out to us anytime for assistance, whether you need guidance on your concept or help with the design process.

Privat.title: Privacy Policy
Privat.introText: We, Keybooks Publishing House (legal entity KAN HOLDING), are committed to protecting the confidentiality of your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard information about the users of our website, in compliance with the Personal Data Protection Act 2010 (Malaysia).
Privat.dataCollection1: Personal data: name, email address, and other contact details you provide when creating an account.
Privat.dataCollection2: Answers to questions: information you provide when answering questions for the creation of a personalized book.
Privat.dataCollection3: Photographs: images you upload to be included in your book.
Privat.dataCollection4: Cover selection: your preferences regarding the design of the book cover.
Privat.dataUsage2: Process your orders and manage your account.
Privat.confidentialityText: The content of your book is visible only to you and our editor. You may choose to decline editing, in which case your material will remain completely anonymous.
Privat.disclaimerText: We make every effort to protect your data, but we cannot guarantee absolute security on the internet. In case of a website breach, we shall not be liable for the leakage of your personal data. We implement various security measures, including electronic, physical, and managerial safeguards.
Privat.rightsText: You have the right to request access, correction, deletion, or restriction of your personal data at any time. You also have the right to object to the processing of your data and request data portability. You may withdraw consent to data processing at any time.
Privat.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new version on this page.
